text: This is a list of lighthouses in Belize. They are mostly located on the islands of the eastern Caribbean coastline of the country. ==Lighthouses== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- bgcolor="#dfdfdf" ! Name ! class="unsortable" align="center" width="120px"|Image ! title: List of lighthouses in Belize
